******************
List of References
******************


.. [GeospatialWorld2010] :

    Geospatial World 2010. The Revolution that is GPS. https://www.geospatialworld.net/article/the-revolution-that-is-gps/

.. [Rosvall2014] :

    Rosvall, M.; Esquivel, A. V.; Lancichinetti, A.; West, J. D.; Lambiotte, R. (2014). Memory in network flows and its effects on spreading dynamics and community detection. *Nature communications* **5**, 4630.

.. [Scholtes2014] :

    Scholtes, I.; Pfitzner, R.; Garas, A.; Tessone, C. J.; Schweitzer, F. (2014). Causality-driven slow-down and speed-up of diffusion in non-Markovian temporal networks. *Nature communications* **5**, 5024.

.. [Scholtes2016] :

    Scholtes, I.; Wider, N.; Garas, A. (2016). Higher-order aggregate networks in the analysis of temporal networks: path structures and centralities. *The European Physical Journal B* **89(3)**, 61.

.. [Scholtes2017] :

    Scholtes, I. (2017). When is a network a network?: Multi-order graphical model selection in pathways and temporal networks. In: *Proceedings of the 23rd ACM SIGKDD International Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining*. ACM, pp. 1037-1046.

.. [Piorkowski2009] :

    Piorkowski, M.; Sarafijanovic‑Djukic, N.; Grossglauser, M. (2009). CRAWDAD dataset epfl/mobility (v. 2009‑02‑24), downloaded from https://crawdad.org/epfl/mobility/20090224, https://doi.org/10.15783/C7J010.
